public ref class Queryable abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying data structures that implement .

span.span: Provides a set of ( in Visual Basic) methods for querying data structures that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在中声明的方法集类提供的标准查询运算符的实现，为查询数据源实现。The set of methods declared in the class provides an implementation of the standard query operators for querying data sources that implement . 标准查询运算符是通用方法，它们按照[!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)]模式，使你能够在任何数据中表示遍历、 筛选和投影运算。基于网络的编程语言。The standard query operators are general purpose methods that follow the [!INCLUDE[vbteclinq](~/includes/vbteclinq-md.md)] pattern and enable you to express traversal, filter, and projection operations over data in any .NET-based programming language. 大多数此类中的方法被定义为扩展的扩展方法类型。The majority of the methods in this class are defined as extension methods that extend the type. 这意味着它们可以通过调用类似于实例方法实现的任何对象。This means they can be called like an instance method on any object that implements . 扩展这些方法不执行任何查询直接。These methods that extend do not perform any querying directly. 相反，它们的功能是以生成对象，它是一个表示累积的查询的表达式树。Instead, their functionality is to build an object, which is an expression tree that represents the cumulative query. 方法然后传递到新的表达式树方法或方法的输入。The methods then pass the new expression tree to either the method or the method of the input . 调用的方法取决于是否方法返回单一实例值，在这种情况下调用时，或产生可枚举的结果，在这种情况下调用。The method that is called depends on whether the method returns a singleton value, in which case is called, or has enumerable results, in which case is called. 由实现的类执行针对目标数据的实际查询执行。The actual query execution on the target data is performed by a class that implements . 任何的假定条件下实现在于执行通过已构造的表达式树的结果标准查询运算符方法等效于调用中的相应方法的结果类，如果数据源是。The expectation of any implementation is that the result of executing an expression tree that was constructed by a standard query operator method is equivalent to the result of calling the corresponding method in the class, if the data source were an . 除了对进行操作的标准查询运算符方法对象，此类还包含一种方法， ，哪些类型对象，以作为对象。In addition to the standard query operator methods that operate on objects, this class also contains a method, , which types objects as objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法具有至少一个类型的参数其类型参数是之一类型。This method has at least one parameter of type whose type argument is one of the types. 对于这些参数，你可以传入的 lambda 表达式中，然后它将编译为。For these parameters, you can pass in a lambda expression and it will be compiled to an . 方法生成，表示调用本身作为一个构造泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 然后将其传递到方法由属性`source`参数。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source` parameter. 执行一个表示调用的表达式树，将发生的查询行为取决于实现的一种`source`参数。The query behavior that occurs as a result of executing an expression tree that represents calling depends on the implementation of the type of the `source` parameter. 预期的行为是指定的函数， `func`，应用中的源序列，并累积每个值返回值。The expected behavior is that the specified function, `func`, is applied to each value in the source sequence and the accumulated value is returned. 中的第一个值`source`用作的累计值，对应于中的第一个参数的种子值`func`。The first value in `source` is used as the seed value for the accumulated value, which corresponds to the first parameter in `func`. 若要简化常见聚合操作的一套标准查询运算符，也包括两个计数方法，和，和四个数字的聚合方法，即， ， ，和.To simplify common aggregation operations, the set of standard query operators also includes two counting methods, and , and four numeric aggregation methods, namely , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用生成的字符串数组中的某个句子。The following code example demonstrates how to use to build a sentence from an array of strings. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的一种`source`实现，直接返回。If the type of `source` implements , returns it directly. 否则，它将返回，通过调用的等效的查询运算符方法中的执行的查询而不是中的那些。Otherwise, it returns an that executes queries by calling the equivalent query operator methods in instead of those in . 此方法假定`source`实现某些`T`。This method assumes that `source` implements for some `T`. 在运行时，结果为类型为同一`T`。At runtime, the result is of type for the same `T`. 在静态不知道的类型时，此方法是动态的方案中十分有用`T`。This method is useful in dynamic scenarios when you do not statically know the type of `T`.

[!code-csharp[System.Linq.Queryable#45](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Queryable/CS/queryable.cs#45)] [!code-vb[System.Linq.Queryable#45](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Linq.Queryable/VB/queryable.vb#45)] 有时的值`default(TSource)`不是你想要使用如果集合不包含任何元素的默认值。Sometimes the value of `default(TSource)` is not the default value that you want to use if the collection contains no elements. 而不是检查不需要的默认值的结果，然后将更改如有必要，你可以使用方法，以指定你想要集合为空时使用的默认值。Instead of checking the result for the unwanted default value and then changing it if necessary, you can use the method to specify the default value that you want to use if the collection is empty. 然后，调用若要获取最后一个元素。Then, call to obtain the last element. 下面的代码示例使用这两种方法来获取默认值为 1 的数字天的月份的集合是否为空。The following code example uses both techniques to obtain a default value of 1 if a collection of numeric days of the month is empty. 由于输入一个整数默认值为 0，这不符合任何一天的月份，必须指定默认值为 1。Because the default value for an integer is 0, which does not correspond to any day of the month, the default value must be specified as 1 instead. 查询完成后，检查第一个结果变量为不需要的默认值。The first result variable is checked for the unwanted default value after the query is completed. 通过调用来获取第二个结果变量指定默认值为 1。The second result variable is obtained by calling to specify a default value of 1. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法生成，表示调用本身作为一个构造泛型方法。The method generates a that represents calling itself as a constructed generic method. 然后将其传递到方法由属性`source1`参数。It then passes the to the method of the represented by the property of the `source1` parameter. 方法将合并第一个序列的每个的元素与第二个序列中具有相同的索引的元素。The method merges each element of the first sequence with an element that has the same index in the second sequence. 如果序列不具有相同数量的元素，该方法将序列合并直到到达其中之一的结尾。If the sequences do not have the same number of elements, the method merges sequences until it reaches the end of one of them. 例如，如果一个序列具有三个元素，并且另一个具有四个，则所产生的序列需要仅三个元素。For example, if one sequence has three elements and the other one has four, the resulting sequence will have only three elements. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法以合并两个序列。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to merge two sequences.
